text: Colleyville is a city and suburb of Dallas and Fort Worth located in northeast Tarrant County, Texas, United States. It is roughly west of Dallas/Fort Worth International Airport. The population was 26,057 at the 2020 census. Colleyville is well known for its public schools, public safety, wealth, and rural atmosphere. ==Hostage crisis== In January 2022, a man took hostages at a synagogue. ==References== Category:Cities in Texas Category:Settlements in Tarrant County, Texas
title: Colleyville, Texas
